original_title: Filmbyen, la nouvelle Mecque du cinéma?
overview: Filmbyen is a cinema-town created by Lars Von Trier (director) et Peter Aalbek Jensen (producer). They founded together a company whiwh regroups all the cinema business industry. That documentary retraces the Filmbyen story, how it functions, the artistic and economic issues that arise.
title: Filmbyen, la nouvelle Mecque du cinéma?
